name: IG1
title: Essential Cyber Hygiene
description: Foundational set of cyber defense Safeguards that every enterprise should apply to guard against the most common attacks.

name: IG2
title: Enterprise Security
description: For enterprises with dedicated IT/Security staff, supporting multiple departments with differing risk profiles and regulatory burdens.

name: IG3
title: Advanced Enterprise Security
description: For enterprises with specialized security experts, sensitive data subject to high regulatory oversight, and need to abate targeted attacks.
